comments:
The TeamMemberViewOverviewSection threw a ClassCastException when selected from the PC-View.  This exception occurs when using the Corona server installed on the Corona's vserser.  It does not happen when using a local (internal) server.

Does it happen in current CVS version? It was fixed last week by Piotr.
